About Service

I will show city in a way you would never forget it, tours and experience that will make your trip truely memorable. I recently graduated completing 2 majors, but I was doing Tour Guiding duting my study. I am 21. I studied Tourism and Languages, I speak fluent Engish, Spanish, Russian, and Ukrainian. I can take you around by my own can and show you beauty secrets on Kiev. I can also make all other travel arrangements (airport pickup, visa) Check my various tours, I design very special tour packages, and I know so many places to visit that you will not find from usual tour guides.
